knimeNode.name: Tree Ensemble Statistics
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides basic statistics on the ensemble and its trees

fullDescription.intro: Provides basic statistics on the tree ensemble and its trees such as depths of trees and the number of nodes in the trees.

ports.outPort: Statistics of the whole ensemble. Including number of trees, minimum, maximum and average on number of levels and number of nodes in the individual trees.
Statistics of the individual trees. Including number of levels (maximal depth) and number of nodes in a tree.
